hero.role: Full Stack Engineer / DVER Technology CEO

about.title: About Me
about.description: With experience in Japan and North America, I pursue development that ensures quality while seeking speed. As a Full-stack Engineer and CEO of DVER Technology, I specialize in building scalable, high-performance applications.
about.vision: Providing next-generation digital solutions that combine practicality and beauty.

items.title: Web/Mobile App Development
items.description: Building cross-platform applications with modern frameworks like React, React Native, and Next.js.

items.title: Backend/Infra
items.description: Designing robust backend systems and cloud infrastructure using Node.js, Go, AWS, and GCP.

items.title: Generative AI Integration
items.description: Implementing cutting-edge AI solutions to automate workflows and enhance user experiences.

items.title: MVP Prototyping
items.description: Rapidly prototyping ideas to validate concepts and iterate quickly based on user feedback.

items.title: User-Centric Design
items.description: Always prioritizing the end-user's needs and experience.

items.title: Clean Code
items.description: Writing maintainable, scalable, and self-documenting code.

items.title: Continuous Learning
items.description: Staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices.

items.title: Agile Methodology
items.description: Embracing change and delivering value in short iterations.

items.title: Global Perspective
items.description: Leveraging diverse experiences to solve complex problems.
